name: Pursuit Force: Extreme Justice
description:
In this sequel to the action-packed Pursuit Force™, control all new playable characters as you track down and bring to justice five hardcore street gangs in and around Capital City. This time around, the high-speed action takes you across land, air and sea in the continued battle to rid the city of crime. Download this PSP® system classic game today to jump into the action!
KEY FEATURES
• Features seven environments, five gangs, and over 50 cases to tackle.
• New vehicles, weapons and stunts make for one of the most action-heavy games to come to PSP® system.
• Epic boss missions with more action and outrageous boss vehicles than ever before.
• 12 vehicle types, including helicopters, cars, jet skis, trucks, buses, bike and sidecar, and speed boats, plus new vehicles including hovercrafts.
• More than 30 types of weapons at the player’s disposal including handguns, shotguns, machine guns, and heavy artillery.
• Multiplayer for up to four players in Ad Hoc mode.
